item.title: DevOps Beginner's Guide
item.description: Overview In this blog, I discussed what is DevOps, and why it has gained so much traction in the IT industry lately. What Is DevOps? It is a combination of practices that streamline the automation and integration of processes between the software development and IT teams. This will help them to build, test, and release software in a faster and more reliable way. Purpose The term was formed by combining the words “development” and “operations” and signifies a cultural shift that helps bridge the gap between the development and operation teams.
